name: Lyric Extractor
tagline: Extract lyrics of songs with web service calls
body: ### Welcome to Lyric Extractor Lyric Extractor is a free REST API which allows to simply extract the lyric of a song via a web service call. ### Technical details Lyric Extractor web service is hosted on Heroku and is developed using Spring Boot framework. The source code will be publicly published soon. Currently the project is in the beta stage and it might have some glitches due to unexpected reasons. ### Getting started For more details about the web service and how to call it checkout our documentation page. ### Authors and Contributors This API is developed and maintained by [Kasra Madadipouya](https://blog.madadipouya.com) (@kasramp). Anyone is welcome to contribute to this project. This page is hosted on Github pages. ### To do Following is the list of to do tasks for this project: * Adding search API based on artist or song name ### Support or Contact Facing any problems, found bugs or having any inquiries? Just drop an email to kasra@madadipouya.com ``` System.out.println("abc"); ``` ` DEF `
